channel.title: A new era for the MESG Token
channel.description:
With the launch of Liteflow, it was time to rethink all of the products of MESG, token included.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/p/5a16b201-101e-456b-b2bc-1e7c30a71023/
